mapper.sql: id, money, consume_type, classify_id, source_account, target_account, merchant_id, project_id, remark, create_time, update_time, is_available, is_deleted, user_id, relation_id, account_book_id
mapper.select:
select cci.money, cci.consume_type, cci.remark, cc.classify_name, cm.merchant_name, cp.project_name, ca.account_name source_account_name, caa.account_name target_account_name from c_consume_item cci left join c_classify cc on cci.classify_id =cc.id left join c_merchant cm on cci.merchant_id =cm.id left join c_project cp on cci.project_id=cp.id left join c_account ca on cci.source_account=ca.id left join c_account caa on cci.target_account=caa.id where cci.is_deleted=0 and cci.is_available=1
order by cci.create_time desc

money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
consume_type = #{consumeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
classify_id = #{classifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
